links.*: The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion
The Lord of the Rings (50th Anniversary Edition)

wikitext.*:
{{ardayearheader|2957|2960|2961|2963|2964|2965|2968}}

* Birth of [[Théodwyn]], fifth child and fourth daughter of [[Kings of Rohan|King]] [[Thengel]] and [[Morwen Steelsheen]].<ref>{{App|Mark}}, ''Thengel''</ref>
* Death of [[Gorbadoc Brandybuck]].<ref name="Brandybuck">{{App|Brandybuck}}</ref>
* [[Rorimac Brandybuck]], son of Gorbadoc and [[Mirabella Took]], becomes the [[Master of Buckland]].<ref name="Brandybuck"/>
* Death of [[Linda Baggins]].<ref name="Baggins">{{App|Baggins}}</ref>

==Note==
In the second edition of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', [[Samwise Gamgee]]'s year of birth was added to ''[[Appendix B|The Tale of Years]]'' as 2963.  This contradicted both the ''Longfather Tree of Master Samwise''<ref>{{App|Gamgee}}</ref> and a later entry in ''The Tale of Years''.<ref>{{App|Later}}, S.R. 1469</ref> The incorrect date has been corrected (to {{TA|2980}}) in the [[The Lord of the Rings (50th Anniversary Edition)|50th anniversary edition]]. See also ''[[The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion]]'', p. 716.

In most editions, [[Appendix C]] gives [[Bingo Baggins]]'s death as {{SR|1360}}, but in some later editions, including the 1994 and 50th anniversary editions, the year is mistakenly given as {{SR|1363|n}}.<ref>Wayne G. Hammond and Christina Scull, [http://www.hammondandscull.com/addenda/rings.html Addenda and Corrigenda to the 50th anniversary edition of The Lord of the Rings (2004–5)].</ref>
